Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.lunalunera.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Class representing the controller of the GameStage class in the view

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(javafx.scene.image.ImageView moonImageView, SecretWord secretWord, javafx.scene.control.TextField[] wordTextField, javafx.scene.control.Label counterFailedAttempts, javafx.scene.control.Button helpButton, javafx.scene.control.Label counterHelp)
      Constructor method
      Parameters:
      secretWord - The secret word which is the input of the user
      wordTextField - The array of text fields for the letter of the secret word
      moonImageView - The image of the status of the moon
      helpButton - The button with the help functionality
      counterHelp - The label for the counter of the helps used
      counterFailedAttempts - The label for the counter of the failed attempts at guessing the word

  • Method Details

    • setMoonPhase

      public void setMoonPhase()
      Method which sets the moon image depending on the number of failed attempts at guessing the secret word
      See Also:
      • SecretWord.BinaryWord.getFailedAttempts()

    • handleHelpButton

      public void handleHelpButton()
      Method which calls the helpWithTheSecretWord() method when the helpButton is clicked and sums one to the counter of helps used If 4 helps are used, the button is disabled
      See Also:
      • helpWithTheSecretWord()

    • helpWithTheSecretWord

      public void helpWithTheSecretWord()
      Method which search for the first space unaswered and answered it with the correct letter

    • handleTextFields

      public void handleTextFields(int index)
      Method which add a listener to one textField of the array and see if the new letter in the array is a subset of the regular expression, which is, if the letter is a legal one. If not, it returns to the previous letter
      Parameters:
      index - an int which specifies the textField of the array

    • handleCorrectAnswers

      public void handleCorrectAnswers(int index)
      Method which add a listener to one textField of the array and see if the new letter is one of the secret word by using the isACorrectAnswer() method. If yes, it disables the text field. If not, it puts the textField in red and puts that textField as a failed attempt in a boolean[], forcing to erase the letter and try again. It also counts and shows the failed attempts.
      Parameters:
      index - the textField which is being verified
      See Also:
      • isACorrectAnswer(String, int)

    • isACorrectAnswer

      public boolean isACorrectAnswer(String answer, int index)
      Method which verifies is a letter is one of the letters of the secret word and if that letters is already found
      Parameters:
      answer - letter being verified, a string
      index - The position of the letter at the word which should be in the text field
      Returns:
      it returns true if the letter is in the secret word, false if not or is already found

    • handleAllTextFields

      public void handleAllTextFields()
      It runs the handleTextFields() and handleCorrectAnswers() methods in all the textField array
      See Also:
      • handleTextFields(int)
      • handleCorrectAnswers(int)
